name: Michal Januszewski
body:
## Projects

### Actively maintained:

* @sailfish-team Sailfish is an open source implementation of the lattice Boltzmann method in CUDA/OpenCL and Python.

### Discontinued:

* sdepy: numerical solver of stochastic differential equations written in CUDA/Python, with support for parameter space scanning.
* fbsplash: Linux framebuffer bootsplash screen; now maintained by @alanhaggai).
* fbcondecor: Linux framebuffer console decorations (kernel patch).

## Interests

* Computational Fluid Dynamics for biologically relevant flows.
* Computational neuroscience.
* GPGPU programming.

## Personal

* [LinkedIn](http://ch.linkedin.com/in/mjanusz)
* [Google+ profile](https://plus.google.com/101980546557758695289/)
